title: Implementation timescales
mainAdvice: Provide a description informing the buyers about the duration it takes to implement this solution

description.mainAdvice: Describe the typical implementation timescales for this Solution
description.additionalAdvice: Add some information describing typical timescales and activities for an implementation. You may also want to address any differences when transitioning from another solution.
